author: publisher12
title: CISF Recruitment 2017 – 69 Assistant Sub-Inspector (Steno) Posts
text: CISF Recruitment 2017 – 69 Assistant Sub-Inspector (Steno) Posts CISF Recruitment 2017 – 69 Assistant Sub-Inspector (Steno) Posts: Directorate General, Central Industrial Security Force (CISF), Ministry of Home Affairs has invited applications for the recruitment of 69 Assistant Sub-Inspector (Steno) vacancies in CISF-2017 for direct candidates. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 28-02-2017 & for North East region, other remote areas 07-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… CISF Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Assistant Sub-Inspector (Steno) 1. Backlog: 13 Posts 2. Current: 56 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18 – 25 years as closing date of receipt of application. Age relaxation is applicable as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Intermediate or Senior Secondary Certificate (10+2) examination from recognized University or equivalent. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Physical Standard Test, Written Test, Skill Test & Medical Examination. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 100/- through Indian Postal Order drawn in favour of PAO CISF, New Delhi payable at GPO, New Delhi & Asstt Comdt (DDO) CISF, West Zone Kharghar, Navi Mumbai payable at GPO Mumbai, Asstt Comdt (DDO) CISF, Southe Zone Chennai payable at GPO Chennai, Asstt Comdt (DDO) CISF East Zone, Patna payable at GPO Patna, Asstt Comdt (DDO) CISF North East Zone, Kolkata payable at GPO, Kolkata. No fee for SC/ ST, Women & Ex-servicemen candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format along with affixed passport size photograph, on affixed on admit card, fee, three self addressed envelopes of 12×27 with affixed postal stamp of Rs.22/-, photostat copies of certificates/ testimonials in support of age, qualification, caste, army discharge certificate to concerned address given in notification on or before 28-02-2017 & for North East region, other remote areas 07-03-2017. Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Application: 28-02-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application for North East Region, Other Remote Areas: 07-03-2017. For more details like eligible criteria, physical standards, medical standards, age relaxation & other information click on the link given below….
